name: Auth send verification Email for linking social profiles
description: This API is used to Send verification email to the unverified email of the social profile.. This API can be used only incase of optional verification workflow.

Get Parameters.name: Note
Get Parameters.description: Here you are required to pass either access_token or clientguid. Without passing the same, you will receive an error.

Get Parameters.name: Note
Get Parameters.description: API will return UUID in response only in the case where OTP Email Verification is enabled for the site. This can be utilized in both Auth Verify Email and Auth Verify Email by OTP API
